hero.introduction: I just want to retire. /n Currently pursuing my Bachelor in 'Biochemistry and Molecular Biology' and also experienced with Web Development (ReactJS, NextJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, Postgresql). Wondering in the web and looking for opportunnity where I can combine skills from both of the world and make the magic happen.

quotes.title: Random Quotes
quotes.subtitle: Words that describe me and probably will demotivate others
